main event: Mr. Rollie Olsen observed an unidentified object slowly descending from the west while he was having dinner on 20 May 1953.
interesting points: Mr. Olsen's observation lasted for about 15-20 minutes., He described the object's movements as erratic, consisting of about eight surges with one second intervals., Mrs. Olsen couldn't see the object but was disturbed by her husband's demeanor., Mr. Olsen used night vision glasses but couldnâ€™t get a clearer view of the object., The object blended into the sky and stars making it difficult for him to distinguish it.
sighted object: an unidentified object in the sky
witness description: Mr. Rollie Olsen, a prosperous merchant
